forecast.name: Today
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 70, with temperatures falling to around 66 in the afternoon. West southwest wind 12 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Partly cloudy, with a low around 56. West southwest wind 10 to 21 mph, with gusts as high as 25 mph.

weather_report:
The air in Downtown San Francisco is crisp and bright as the sun casts its warm gaze across the City by the Bay. With temperatures hovering comfortably near seventy degrees, it is a perfect day to relish the outdoors. The west-southwest winds add a gentle rustle to the leaves, lending life to the tranquil atmosphere, while the remnants of the morning’s marine layer retreat gracefully to reveal a clean and clear skyline. This clarity unveils an exhilarating view of the Golden Gate Bridge, its iconic silhouette contrasting beautifully against an azure backdrop, urging one to embark on an urban adventure.

As evening approaches, the temperature will subtly descend to a mild sixty, inviting layers for a cozy night out. A light jacket or sweater will serve well against the lingering breeze. Given the delightful conditions, an afternoon stroll along the Embarcadero might serve as a rejuvenating escape, where one can sip a warming coffee while watching boats glide through the shimmering waters. Alternatively, seeking a quieter respite in one of the many local parks would allow for a peaceful moment to reflect and unwind, perfectly embodying the serene charm of San Francisco at its finest.
